issue.title: [C++] Add crossbow job to capture build setup
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9273](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9273). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As discussed in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7287#issuecomment-645432605, the CI jobs cannot capture some build problems. So we want a crossbow job to capture such problems.
